channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 08:46 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 08:46 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
